merge_before_transcript:
ross: Yeah well if, if, if Mark said that, than Mark's an idiot.
joey: Mark's a genius!
ross: Why?! How?! How is he a genius?
chandler_transcript: Look, don't you see what's happening here. Instead of hitting on her right away, he's becoming her confidant. Now he's gonna be the guy she goes too to complain about you.
